videos.title: Spoon Test Control
videos.description: Control film showing that passing a metal spoon under the paper does not produce striation, ruling out mechanical artefact. Confirms that only magnetic field affects the grains.
videos.author: Jerome Frasson

videos.title: Magnet Test Live
videos.description: Live demonstration showing magnetic alignment and clustering of soil grains on paper as a magnet is moved underneath.
videos.author: Jerome Frasson

videos.title: Turning Magnetites (100×)
videos.description: Close-up film at 100× magnification showing magnetite grains moving, rotating, and self-assembling dynamically under a moving magnetic field in water.
videos.author: Jerome Frasson
